entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
